fieldOverrides.formula:
'Deal: ' + Property__c.Deal__r.Name + '

' + 'Lender: ' + text(Property__c.Deal__r.Lender__c)+ '

' + 'Line of Credit Commitment Amount: ' + '$' + IF( Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Property__c.LOC_Commitment__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) + '

' + 'Loan Number: ' + Property__c.Deal_Loan_Number__c+ '

' + 'Requested Funding Date: ' + text(MONTH(Property__c.Requested_Funding_Date__c))+ '/' + text(DAY(Property__c.Requested_Funding_Date__c))+ '/' + text(YEAR(Property__c.Requested_Funding_Date__c))+'

' + 'Title Company: ' + Property__c.Title_Company_text__c + '

' + 'Title Contact Name: ' + Property__c.Title_Contact_Name__c + '

' + 'Title Contact Phone: ' + Property__c.Title_Contact_Phone__c + '

' + 'Title Contact Email: ' + Property__c.Title_Contact_Email_Address__c + '

' + 'Closer: ' + Property__c.Closer__r.FirstName + ' ' + Property__c.Closer__r.LastName +'

' + 'Address: ' + Property__c.Name+ ', ' + Property__c.City__c+ ', ' + text(Property__c.State__c) + ', ' + Property__c.ZipCode__c+ '

' + 'Appraisal Order Date: ' + text(MONTH(Property__c.BPO_Appraisal_Order_Date__c)) + '/' + text(DAY(Property__c.BPO_Appraisal_Order_Date__c)) + '/' +text(YEAR(Property__c.BPO_Appraisal_Order_Date__c))+ '

' + 'Renovation or Non Renovation: ' + Property__c.Renovation_Type_formula__c + '

'
